name: OpenTTD
summary:
OpenTTD is a business simulation game initially developed by Ludvig Strigeus in which players earn money by transporting passengers and cargo via road, rail, water, and air. It is an open-source remake and expansion of the 1995 Chris Sawyer video game Transport Tycoon Deluxe.

Connect industries and cities on procedurally-generated maps of up to 4096 x 4096 tiles by building a network of roads, railways, docks, and airports. Navigate dense city streets, cross oceans and rivers, and conquer high mountains in one of four climates.

Work alone or with friends to complete production chains and transport finished goods to towns. Assemble a fleet of hundreds of vehicles, transferring cargo as needed in an interconnected, multimodal network with optional cargo destinations.

Keep up with technological improvements through the years as towns grow; new modes of transport are invented; and industries appear, change production, or fail. Expand stations and build network capacity to keep up with demand and avoid delays.

Customize your OpenTTD experience via community-made mods downloaded through an in-game content service, including real-world vehicles, new industry sets, custom scenarios, and more.

OpenTTD is free and open-source software, licensed under the GNU General Public License version 2.0. OpenTTD is under ongoing development. OpenTTD is not an abbreviation of anything.

name: Operation Air Assault 2
summary:
The threat from international terrorism has never been greater. When an intelligence report highlights the disturbing prospect that a radical militia group may have access to nuclear weapons the very fabric of our society is under threat. A war is imminent, fortunately at the forefront of your arsenal is an all-new attack helicopter and when the call comes to wage war against the enemy there is only one pilot for the job.

Operation Air Assault is a fast-paced 3D attack helicopter game and your mission is to seek and destroy the radical militia using the most technologically devastating weaponry at your disposal. The war on terror is a reality. Fight the war in Operation Air Assault.

name: Open Fishing 2
summary: Open Fishing 2 is a chill open world fishing game. Fill out a book with 115 fish species, meet friendly fish gods, sail the oceans with your boat, cook, draw your own map, and enjoy fishing without worries.

name: Operation: Escape
summary: A sci-fi top-down shooter game. 2D top-downYou shooting game. You get kidnapped by alien from far away and infested by their blood, which makes you able to use their weapon. You have to get out there before they catch you and do some weird thing with your body

name: Open Ocarina
summary:
Open Ocarina is a PC port of the decompiled The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time originally for the Nintendo 64.

It supports features such as 30-120 fps, free camera, rumble, gyro aim, and HD texture packs.

name: Oppai Oppai Orbs
summary:
Puzzle game featuring a girl whom expands the size of her breasts in correlation with the two biggest orbs merging. The more orbs merge, the more exposed her chest becomes.

Make two of the same color orbs touch to merge, the game ends when any orb escapes the play area or the maximum bust size is reached. The final orbs are dark purple, if they merge they will pop out of existence.

name: Operation Abyss: New Tokyo Legacy
summary:
Operation Abyss is a first person RPG dungeon crawler with turn-based battles using a customized team of 6 characters from a total of 10 classes.

Operation Abyss: New Tokyo Legacy is a combined remake of the first two games in the Generation Xth trilogy, Code Hazard and Code Breaker, by Experience Inc. based on the Wizardry series. They were only released in Japan.

The sequel "Operation Babel: New Tokyo Legacy" is the remake of the third Generation Xth game, Code Realize.

name: Operation: Armored Liberty
summary: Operation: Armored Liberty puts gamers in command of an M1A1 Abrams Battle Tank as they battle against Soviet-built T72s, take out S.C.U.D. launchers, and Iraqi helicopter gun-ships. The object: liberate Baghdad.

name: Operation Highjump: The Fall of Berlin
summary: In the last days of World War II, lead a suicide mission to hunt down the enemy leaders, steal their experimental technology and recover the art pieces and relics. A combination of frenetic action, tactical missions and an explosive run & gun platforming adventure.

name: Operation Athena
summary: Operation Athena is a tactical first person shooter that takes inspiration from classic tactical shooters with updated modern mechanics. Take part as an operator of Athena Team solo or with up to 4 players against a global terrorist threat.

name: Operation Caucasus
summary: Operation Caucasus is an action packed, first person shooter game.

name: Operator Unknown
summary: IReCorp gave you access to memory. But whose memory is it — and where is the exit from someone else's dream?

name: Open Up!
summary: Trin Park's only job while her parents are out of town is to make sure her little sister stays out of trouble. Should be easy enough. The kid usually keeps to herself anyway...

name: Open Saber Plus
summary: A basic implementation of the Beat Saber game mechanic for VR using the Godot Game Engine and the Godot Oculus Quest Toolkit.

name: Open Source Objects: The Game
summary: A Ren'Py game created by the many, many people behind Open Source Objects, taking place as a prequel to the events of Episode 4 of the web show.

name: Operation: Strike & Secure
summary: Operation: Strike & Secure is a tactical and realistic FPS where every shot matters, designed for intense solo or team-based online combat.

name: Opportunity: A Sugar Baby Story
summary: Opportunity: A Sugar Baby Story is a warm, lighthearted erotic visual novel exploring what it means to rebuild and reinvent yourself against a backdrop of late-stage capitalism.

name: Operation DogFight
summary: Take to the skies in a world of conflict between humankind's best friends and the evil cat empire! Experience over-the-top flight combat in a thrilling Story Mode that’ll leave your tail wagging, or fetch up to three of your bestest friends and compete to find the top-dog in local multiplayer.

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition
summary:
Opus: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition is the definitive edition of the visual novel style adventure game, now with all new voice acting.

Asteroids emitting a sound known as "Starsongs" have become the center of conflict for the immense power they hold. Determined to claim asteroids of his own, a young man ventures out with a girl who can imitate starsongs, lending her voice to unravel an ancient myth deep in the heart of space.

name: Operation Valor
summary: Operation Valor is a tactical top-down multiplayer shooter that provides large scale combined-arms combat through base building and teamwork. This game is a cross between action-packed military gameplay and RTS-style mechanics.

name: OpsCam: Body Cam Shooter
summary: Equip weapons and dominate every fight.

name: Opscam
summary: OpsCam is a multiplayer team game. Players engage in fast-paced combat in close-quarters environments. Join other players in thrilling PvP battles.

name: Operation: New Earth
summary: Operation: New Earth is an intense sci-fi multiplayer strategy game in which you must command an advanced military facility to defend Earth from a hostile alien invasion. Create an alliance, gather resources, and unlock advanced technology to level up your stronghold!

name: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission
summary: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission is the remake of the first Rail Shooter that shaped the genre. It sticks to the DNA of the original game – a breathtaking action atmosphere inherited from 80’s action movies – while offering a brand-new design and a leaderboard.

name: Operation Babel: New Tokyo Legacy
summary:
Operation Babel is a first person RPG dungeon crawler with turn-based battles using a customized team of 6 characters.

Operation Babel is the sequel to Operation Abyss: New Tokyo Legacy and the remake of the third game in the Generation Xth trilogy, Code Realize.

"Continue the story of Operation Abyss and defend near-future Tokyo from a new threat in this dungeon crawling RPG. When a mysterious object - dubbed ‘the Embryo’ - appears in the sky, the CPA and the Xth Squad are mobilized to face the new threat. Venture into challenging new labyrinths and create the perfect team to challenge each threat. Featuring a mysterious new story, unprecedented character customization through the new ‘Sub-Blood’ system, and item-based character ability modifications, Operation Babel: New Tokyo Legacy will give you a world to lose yourself in."

name: Open School World
summary: This game is Open School World. The game takes place in the open fictional small world "Sakura Town". We designed the game scene to feel like you are in a hybrid world, and as a student, you can experience a simulated high school day-to-day life. This game is not an action and shooting game etc, but a simulator. There is no end to this game. Make situations to your liking and find your favorite way to play. We hope you will like this game. You can talk to students and others, make friends and lovers through simulations, attend school classes, buy things for yourself or give away, and more. Enjoy her busy days. Go to class, listen to your favorite lectures, take your favorite physical education classes. The controls of this game are super easy and fun to make fun of your friends and hug them like you did in high school. Bring back the old school days in your life. You can talk, take classes and take pictures. This game provides challenges, is super fun, and will help ease your boredom on your real campus. Different days will bring you new tasks so you will never get bored. Anime High School Simulator takes you on a journey full of fun, drama and adventure. Allows you to enjoy school life as a student or again as a student, free to love, drive, play, and enjoy life. Stunning levels and high-quality 3D graphics of school life, different missions will bring you the fun of adventure in anime high school life simulation. Enjoy adventure as an anime schoolgirl and take on all the tough challenging missions of school life.

name: Operación Tigre Blanco
summary:
Operation White Tiger was a Spanish interactive educational adventure that required answering basic questions about biology and anatomy, among others, in order to progress.
The story is about a secret agent named Hache who needs to rescue a lost albino tiger cub that was being studied by biologists in the Indian city of Bengal.

name: Open Fire
summary: In this police first-person shooter, you'll take on the role of an officer tasked with handling dangerous suspects, saving civilians, and reporting crucial evidence all across unique environments that challenge your skills and decision-making.

name: Operation D-DAY: One Second of War
summary:
How long can you survive?

War isn’t cinematic. It isn’t glorious. It isn’t fair.

This is the brutal truth of battle—where many never became heroes, only memories.

In this hardcore 3D first-person shooter, you don’t get second chances. You don’t respawn. You don’t rack up killstreaks. You drop into the chaos of D-Day, and within seconds—a bullet, an explosion, a breath later—you’re gone.

No time for heroics. No epic battles. Just the unforgiving reality of war’s first heartbeat.

The question isn’t whether you’ll survive. It’s how long you’ll last.

Will you be one of the lucky few… or just another name lost to history?

Step onto the beach. Take that first step. But remember… your war could be over in an instant.

name: Openlid
summary: A interpretation of Yume Nikki in 3D, developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Opus Castle
summary: Opus Castle it's a 3D horror, adventure and mysterious game with a narrative based on the real tragic history of the little castle on Apa Street, located in the city of São Paulo, Brazil.

name: Operation Scorpion: Take Down
summary: A single-player FPS game that fights against terrorists around the world! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons! Weapons that excite military fans!

name: OpenSandbox
summary: Sandbox game inspired by Garry's mod, using the ID Tech 3 Engine

name: Optical Inquisitor
summary:
Its the year 1988. Acid wash jeans are in.
Our hero, Tommy Rissken has been betrayed by his friends and had to serve a prison sentence for 8 years.

Now he's back with a vengeance. With your help, he'll get his revenge on his 'friends' and be able to return to his daughter.

Top 10 Strategy Game in over 10 countries!

name: Open Star Fighter
summary: Open Star Fighter is a space-themed shooting game where players pilot starfighters to engage in intense battles against enemy forces.

name: Operation: Tango
summary: It takes two to save the world in this Asymmetrical Spy Thriller. Pair up with a friend as a special agent or elite hacker, and work together to bring a high-tech global menace to its knees.

name: Opollo
summary: Little Minimalist Arcade High Score Chaser with 200+ Vehicle combinations.

name: OpenBlocks
summary: OpenBlocks is a mod for Minecraft that adds various helpful and unique blocks and items.

name: Operation Trick-Or-Treat
summary: Operation Trick-Or-Treat is an adventure minigame where the player must complete levels by tracking down all the candy in each, using the innate powers of various Halloween costumes. Can you finish all the levels? For extra challenge, try to find all the hidden coins in each level, or go for a record time.

name: Operation: Hostage Rescue
summary: Gear up. Get in. Get them out!

name: Operation Zeta
summary: Operation Zeta is a space action game. The great battle codenamed 'Operation Zeta' has been lost. Your ship is in shambles and you have to act quickly to collect all of the parts and repair your ship before the warzone is completely destroyed by the enemy's death laser. Play and unlock 13 playable characters from space monkeys to mischievous slugs each with their own unique set of skills and challenges. As well unlock new abilities and upgrades with credits you earn during each run. Each time you play the universe is randomly generated with random quests from wacky local aliens who have stolen the parts of your ship. All in a physics based battlefield, but beware as you only have ten minutes until the death laser fires!

name: Open World Foreva
summary: Explore, create & survive. In this large procedural world you can: Build, fight, explore, craft and much more. Every player is inside the same world, since interaction and co-creation is sought after. Play solo, or build with friends. Explore and find new technology to power your base!

name: Opus Castle: Chapter III
summary:
In Chapter 3 of Opus Castle, the mystery surrounding the tragic events on Apa Street deepens. The shadows grow denser, and the line between reality and illusion begins to blur. As you venture into previously unseen areas of the castle, you'll discover disturbing memories hidden within its walls.

The paranormal phenomena become increasingly intense, and each decision you make brings you closer to one of several story paths—will you find the truth or be swallowed by the castle's darkness?

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong
summary: Echo of Starsong is a Narrative puzzle adventure game. Eda, a girl who can hear mysterious sound waves known as starsong, crosses paths with a young man in search of their source. Together, they venture out to the heart of space to unravel an ancient myth.

name: Open Season
summary:
Open Season is a video game, based on the movie of the same name.

While Patrick Warburton, Matthew W. Taylor, Nika Futterman and Danny Mann reprise their roles from the movie, most of the original people were replaced (for example, Chris Williams and Matthew W. Taylor are the voices of Boog and Elliot in this game).

name: Opus: The Day We Found Earth
summary: Opus: The Day We Found Earth is a stargazing experience handcrafted for people who enjoy story driven games and arguing about Pluto. After eons of spreading across the cosmos, humanity has lost its way back. Help the childlike robot Emeth carry on his creator's will of finding our long lost home, and peer into a forgotten galaxy through the lens of a deep space telescope.

name: OpenBlox
summary: A Roblox client for older maps for the DS.

name: Operation Deep Magic: Cryptanalysis
summary: Reconnaissance operatives infiltrated a corporate building and extracted electronics and files encrypted with 56-bit DES. Items were handed over to you, the cryptanalyst. Your mission is to decrypt the files.

name: Operation Blackout
summary: Operation Blackout is an atmospheric first-person shooter where you venture into an abandoned industrial facility to eliminate unknown monsters. Use your skills, scavenge for weapons and supplies, and uncover the secrets lurking in the shadows of this dark place.

name: Optimal Conditions for a Sacrifice
summary: It’s very straightforward and approximately 5k words short and has slightly different offering outcomes but they all lead to the same one ending; couple of dead-ends are present in case you mess up.

name: Operation Purge
summary: Operation Purge is a story-driven sci-fi survival game set on Titan, Saturn’s mysterious moon. Explore the terrain, manage limited resources, and uncover the secrets hidden beneath the surface. Will you survive long enough to find the truth?

name: Operation Secret Storm
summary: After a briefing of the Gulf War situation, Agent George, a Top CIA agent, is being sent to the Middle East. Your mission is to save all oil refineries in the Gulf, and stop further production of CBW (Chemical and Biological Warfare) weapons. You are expected to engage in combat with Saddam and his men. To complete the mission, you must use every skill and determination to defeat Saddam. Remember, many lives are at stake.

name: Operation Fireball
summary: Operation Fireball is a horizontal scrolling shooter viewed from above at an elevated angle, with the screen scrolling constantly from left to right as you use various modes of transport to get to a base to blow up a submarine. Between each mode of transport is a small animated scene as you move from one to the next and the modes are car, speedboat, ski, motorbike and helicopter. You must shoot or avoid the enemy in various vehicles or on skis, as well as avoid obstacles like rocks, oil patches and trees. Helicopters fly overhead and drop bombs while missiles fly from the right to the left and can only be avoided. If you are hit by anything then you lose part of a shield gauge but when not being hit increases it and if it empties then it is game over.

name: Operation: Black Mesa
summary: Experience the Half-Life expansion packs like never before. Operation: Black Mesa features reimaginings of both Half-Life: Opposing Force and Half-Life: Blue Shift through two unique campaigns. How will you survive the Black Mesa Incident? It's time to choose.

name: Opus Castle: Chapter IV
summary: Chapter 4 invites you into the heart of the castle's darkest secrets. Time begins to distort, showing the past as if it were the present. Visions of those who lived—and died—there become inescapable. The castle begins to reveal its own consciousness, reacting to your presence. Your investigation into the tragedy becomes personal, and each ghost you encounter has a story to tell—or a warning to deliver.

name: Opie: The Defender
summary: Opie: The Defender is an action game involves building a base, crafting weapons and exploring environments with dynamic combat system.

name: Operação Prato
summary: 'Operação Prato' is a game based on one of Brazil's greatest ufological mysteries. Step into the shoes of Mario, the reporter who will risk his own life to expose the entire truth about the events that terrified the residents of the Colares region.

name: Operation Lone Wolf
summary: Operation Lone Wolf is a multiplayer & soon to be Singleplayer first person shooter, set in the second world war. You can play with up to 10 players, in different free for all gamemodes. At the moment this game has 8 gamemodes, including: standard free for all, gungame, sniper, shotgun and pistol-only and more. You can play on 10 different maps, set on all kinds of locations. Operation Lone Wolf has small maps, and big, more open maps so there are many gameplay options available for the players. This game is not trying to be a realistic representation of WW2, but more of an arcade, fast paced shooter, in which having fun is the main goal. Post launch updates like new maps, new gamemodes etc. will all be free, and there are no in-game purchases in Operation Lone Wolf. The game will cost around $17 at launch.

name: Ophelia's Chapter
summary: A story-rich, psychological-horror adventure game. Play as an urban witch with psychic abilities and delve into the mysteries of a world inspired by the work of Neil Gaiman and Stephen King.

name: Operation Frog
summary: Operation Frog is an educational title where players explore the inner body of a frog. You can choose between a male and female frog in the References section. There are two game modes: Dissect and Reconstruct. In Dissect mode, players have to cut open the frog's body and remove its organs; and in Reconstruct mode, players have to put the already removed organs back to the frog's body in the correct order. This game offers you scissors, a probe, a magnifying glass and tweezers - the necessary tools for your work. The scissors (not available in Reconstruct section) help you cut the frog's body and remove organs, the probe gives you hints of where to cut (in Dissect section) or which part to place first (in Reconstruct section), the magnifying glass gives you information about each organ, and the tweezers help you move the organs. You don't have to remove all the organs to see their information as you can look them up anytime at the Frog File Index section. You can also see the arrangement of the organs at the OptiFrog section. The game offers players a saving function.

name: Operation Night Strikers
summary: Taito's 80's arcade hits hit back! Four milestones of the 80s arcade movement in one action-packed compilation!

name: Open Wheel Manager 2
summary: Open Wheel Manager 2 - is a management sim for open wheel racing fans who want to venture back to 90s and go wheel to wheel with competitive teams.

name: Operation Serpens
summary: Operation Serpens is a fast-paced action shooter with great arcade feel. Join an elite unit that formed to dismantle the evil Snakes Organization.

name: Oppidum
summary: Face the challenges of Oppidum, a cooperative multiplayer adventure. Collaborate, craft, fight, and dive into a captivating story to uncover a powerful truth. A world hanging by a thread needs your help – will you answer the call?

name: Operation: Surface Takeover
summary: A pixelated 2.5D RTS meets tower defense as you battle mutated ants in a short campaign. Build walls, place turrets, and hold the line to reclaim Earth's surface in this tactical fight for survival where placement of everything matters.

name: OpenMinded
summary:
A 2D/3D Cinematic Horror Adventure Game. In early stages of development. 
 
Feeling Terrible Studio is producing its first game and would love to invite everyone to follow us as we progress on the development from sketch to game. Follow us on Instagram and twitter to see our sketchbook, artworks, animations, teasers and much more.

name: Opposite Day 2
summary: Sequel to Opposite Day. Follow the game instructions exactly as they are written. They won't lead you astray... or will they? Find a way to avoid the red lava and reach the other side of the screen. If you touch it you have to start over from the beginning.

name: Opus Torrentia
summary: Opus Torrentia is a surreal exploration RPG with inspiration from the classics such as Earthbound and Yume Nikki. (it’s a quirky RPGmaker game, what do you want from me?) It has strange environments, curious characters, fun abilities, puzzles, minigames and secretssss!

name: Opus Ludum
summary: Opus Ludum is a game of wit and skill, where you will have to overcome various challenges that will test your razor-sharp intellect at every step. Opus Ludum will give you a break from daily stress, although it might just break your head.

name: Open Bar
summary: Have you ever dreamed of being a bartender? Ever wonder what magical ingredients actually make up those mystic cocktails? Now's your chance! With this first person, 3D, cooking style game, you are the bartender! Serve customers, take drink orders, earn tips and most fun of all, make the drinks!

name: Operius DX
summary: Blast off into Operius DX, a high-speed arcade shooter where you navigate twisting polygonal tunnels, battle waves of enemies, and confront formidable bosses in an endless amount of procedurally-generated levels. How far can you get?

name: Operation Zero
summary: Grab your biggest gun and jump into this story-driven top-down run-and-gun sci-fi arcade shooter starring the ultimate bio-engineered hero-manchild TASKILLER!

name: Operation: Inner Space
summary:
Operation: Inner Space is an action game developed in 1992 and published in 1994 by Software Dynamics for Windows. The player's mission is to enter the computer (represented by "Inner Space") in a spaceship and recover the icons and resources that have been set loose by an invasion, and ultimately to destroy the "Inner Demon". The player interacts with other spacecraft along the way, and can compete in races for icons.

You can choose a ship from one of six teams (there is also a seventh AI-only team), and interactions will depend almost entirely on which team you pick. All of the teams have relations with each other.

name: Open Robot
summary: Third-person shooter action adventure about robots. Explore, drive cars, talk to other characters and fight your enemies to survive and complete the quest-driven story mode, or fight your way through the survivor mode!

name: Operation Eventide
summary:
"If it's my soul that makes my body worth hurting, what's an empty shell got to lose?"

An Arbiter is a superhuman soldier, women with the ability to manifest their soul and transform into angels with boundless strength. They are the most powerful weapons the world has to offer, and the most reliable defense against Aberrations, tyrannical demons that descend from the moon and leave nothing but destruction in their wake.

Adelle Krouve —self-proclaimed “hero”— is an Arbiter with an indomitable sense of purpose. She's given the task of destroying the last Aberration standing: a ruthless steel hydra named ‘Edge Ixia Atlas SeigaRozen.’

Five years later, she wakes up in a body that is not her own: A shabby mechanical replica with only bits of her human self remaining—just enough to consider herself back from the dead.

What's worse, the scientist who claims to have rebuilt her refuses to give her a reason why.

name: Operation Blindside: Annihilation
summary: Operation Blindside: Annihilation is a tactical, highly-realistic military-simulation shooter based upon the Operation Flashpoint mil-sim series. It is developed and published by RV Studios.

name: Open Mod
summary: A free-to-play, tactical, community-driven first person shooter that aims to expand slowly and steadily. We focused our attention on game mechanics and customizability, providing our players the opportunity to personalize their experience on as many levels as possible.

name: Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising
summary:
Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising is a game about a fictitious conflict on one of the Sakhalin islands, a conflict that is in danger of erupting onto a global scale. The player takes the role of a US soldier, part of the allied force fighting against outnumbering Chinese forces vying for control of the island.

The game centers on a campaign narrative that gives the player a variety of roles in the allied forces ranging from a Marine Infantry, tank commander, Special Forces and helicopter captain. The game has an incredible realistic depiction of war with careful attention to the detail of the weapons, equipment and tactics of the armed forces. The action is varied from intense fire fights through to slower pace tactical decision making on how to best tackle the mission objectives.

name: Operator Ace's Simple Infinite Survival
summary: O.A.S.I.S is a simple wave based Zombie survival shooter, that combines the best elements of classic arcade-style shooters with the atmosphere of an alternate 80's dystopian world. Just relax and Have some fun, Solo or with up to 3 friends.

name: Operation: Solar Flare
summary: You are Zulu 1, the leader of fireteam Zulu, a Spartan III commando team. Take part in the Siege of Paris IV with pre-2000s art-style and classic-esque gameplay.

name: Opening Night
summary: A mystery at the comedy club

name: Opus: Prism Peak
summary: Opus: Prism Peak is a narrative adventure where your choices lead to divergent endings. Play as a photographer lost in an ethereal realm, and unveil its mysteries with your camera to find a way home.

name: Operation Ninurta: Eris Portal
summary: Operation Ninurta is a third-person tactical shooter with roguelike elements. Explore an infinite procedural maze on Eris, face mutants and bosses, find three crystal keys, and reactivate the portal to win. With limited ammo, upgrades, and warped realities, strategy is vital.

name: Open Hunting XL
summary: Open Hunting XL is a hunting simulator focused on creating a customizable experience. Hunt small game with engaging systems tailored to those animals. Go after deer with challenging realistic gameplay or go for a casual day out hunting after tweaking your experience to what you enjoy.

name: Opia
summary: Opia is a short comedy-horror visual novel with a few endings and many choices. The player is on their first date with Kira, but right from the start, things feel strange.

name: Opus Magnum
summary:
Master the intricate, physical machinery of the transmutation engine— the alchemical engineer’s most advanced tool— and use it to create vital remedies, precious gemstones, deadly weapons, and more.

Design Machines - Design and build machines that carry out alchemical processes using a variety of components.
Open-Ended Puzzles - Compete against your friends and the world to build the simplest, fastest, and most compact solutions. Export animated GIFs to show them off.
Steam Workshop - Make and share your own puzzles with full Steam Workshop integration and an easy-to-use puzzle editor.
Solitaire Minigame - Take a break with Sigmar’s Garden, an original alchemy-based solitaire game.

name: Operation Hardcore
summary: Operation Hardcore is an action-packed 2D side-scrolling shooter inspired by classic twitchy action games of yesteryear, but with modern touches and conveniences.

name: Open Tournament
summary: Open Tournament is a futuristic first person shooter where players master innovative weapons and dynamic movement to prove they are the best. Open Tournament is an open-source project currently in development by a community of veteran developers & Unreal Tournament fans.

name: Operation Apex
summary: A virtual reality underwater adventure for the Vive in which you, a citizen scientist, take control of a research rig in order to learn about the current state of the oceans. As you begin to learn how to study the seas you are witness to one of the largest great white sharks ever seen. Moments later, your mission is clear - travel through the kelp, down the continental shelf and out in the open ocean to find and scan the mysterious shark.

name: Operation Flashpoint: Resistance
summary: Operation Flashpoint: Resistance is an expansion to the original game that adds a new campaign, new 100km sq. island, and an enhanced graphics engine that allows higher resolution textures in game.

name: Operation Flashpoint: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Hide, sneak up on enemies, defend and attack your way through intense military campaigns this detailed combat and tactical experience. Operation Flashpoint: Game of the Year Edition includes Operation Flashpoint: Cold War Crisis, Operation Flashpoint: Red Hammer Expansion Pack and Operation Flashpoint: Resistance Expansion Pack.

name: OP.1953
summary: A space colony management game

name: Operation Save Anna
summary: There's a virus outbreak at a medieval military base. There are a lot of mutated zombies out there. The base doctor has developed a vaccine that works well against this mutated virus, and your job is to protect it from the zombies. Are you ready?

name: Opus: Rocket of Whispers - Deluxe Edition
Operation Logic Bomb
summary:
The best scientists in the world have been working for years on the Subspace Particle Transfer Project, a process that uses subspace transporters to dematerialize an object, then instantly rematerializes it at another location. Short distance transfers of individuals have also been successful, and the scientists were about to begin long-range transport experiments.

However, contact with the research laboratory has been lost. Someone - or something - has taken over the facility and shut down all outside communications. There is no information about the intruders or their capabilities... no one has entered the facility and returned to tell about it. Plans for a final assault have been prepared and if it fails, there will be no choice but to destroy the entire installation. Agent Logan, who has been fitted with bioelectronic implants that give him superior strength, reflexes, and anlystical abilities, has been briefed on all aspects of the mission. Now it's up to him to infiltrate the lab, neutralize the intruders, and rescure the scientists.

name: Operation Eventide: Dolorosa
summary:
In a world where steel monsters called 'Aberrations' are Earth's enemy number one, 'Arbiters,' or as many call 'magical girls' boast strength where even nuclear weaponry fails. Humanity's beacon of hope lies in the center of a military facility where a skeleton crew of mad scientists work around the clock on whatever freak experiments suit their contractor's whims.

In the last resort to isolate and preserve the Arbiters' powers before its too late, secret agent Helena Slater is the only washed-up layabout for the job.

name: Operation Enduring Pretzel
summary: Operation Enduring Pretzel is a Czech indie FPS game where you infiltrate a government building taken over by terrorists. You progress through different floors (Garden, Ground Floor, 1st Floor, Basement), collecting keys, documents, weapons (like COLT, submachine gun, and MINIGUN), and battling enemies.

name: Operation Deadbolt
summary:
The UAC's experiments with terraforming, teleportation and energy weapons had long been of interest to various rival companies, but they refused any cooperation offers due to the sensitive nature of their resarch. It was only a matter of time before someone wormed their way into their workforce to see how the UAC ticked.

One such rival is Yoshikatsu Heavy Industries, specializing ﻿in bionics, industrial machinery, aerospace research and pharmaceutics. You've worked for them for a while, and they selected you to try and sneak your way into the UAC by posing as a maintenance technician.

Surprisingly, you were able to get in without much issue - they weren't even fazed by you hanging around board meetings on occasion, nor did they notice you kept tabs on the factory floor whenever you passed by. You're sure they didn't even bother looking into misplaced schematics, because you did as told and shredded sensitive data. Of course, you took a good look at it first thanks to your cyber eyes.

﻿﻿

Things were going quite well until the facility you were at went into lockdown - no briefing, no coordination. Everyone quick enough to leave must have escaped, but everyone else? They're likely dead, given the place looked like a charnel house.

Except no one bothered informing the lowly pawns keeping the place running, which includes you.

With much more at stake than technical data, you retrieve the one weapon you ﻿brought along and decide it's time to bail.

Good luck, agent Ayumu.

name: Open Country
summary: Ok Scout, it's time to show us what you’re made of-break free from your city life and live like a real outdoorsman. The wilderness isn’t for the faint of heart, but if you work hard, learn how to use the environment and be one with nature, you too can become a Master Outdoorsman.

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong - Deluxe Edition
summary: OPUS: Echo of Starsong Deluxe Edition includes 4 items: OPUS: Echo of Starsong, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Artbook, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Complete Soundtrack, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script.

name: Operation Remode
summary: Welcome to WI Corp, Moddie Operator! Proceed through various levels inside WI Corp's headquarters while defending it from a perilous threat to its secrets using M.O.D.D.I.E, an high tech modular rifle, in this new single player, low-poly style, Twin-Stick Shooter.

name: Operation Dimera
summary: Operation Dimera is a co-op game for up to 3 players where you and your friends must save the world. Tackle diverse missions. Work together to solve puzzles that stand in your way and customize your weapons to be ready for anything! The fate of the world is in your hands!

name: Opus: Rocket of Whispers
summary: Opus: Rocket of Whispers is a single-player third-person adventure set in the snowy post-apocalyptic wilderness of an unknown world, far in the future. Players will play as the last survivors of a nation that has an ancient tradition of cosmic worship, and belief that by launching space burials, those who've deceased will be able to return and rest among the stars. Throughout the game players will travel the snow covered landscape, scavenging for rocket parts and remnants of the past, so they may help the last surviving witch - religious figures who conduct the rituals of space burials - to launch one final burial. The game explores themes of purpose, pursuit and loneliness.

name: Opus: Collector's Edition
summary:
Opus: Collector's Edition includes:

- Opus: The Day We Found Earth - The Game
- Opus: The Day We Found Earth - Original Soundtrack
- Opus: Rocket of Whispers - The Game
- Opus: Rocket of Whispers - Original Soundtrack
- Opus: Rocket of Whispers - Official Artbook with Bonus World Map
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Official Artbook
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Official Game Script Vol.1
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Official Game Script Vol.2
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Complete Soundtrack Vol.1
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Complete Soundtrack Vol.2

name: OpenFront
summary: Free RTS Point and Click

name: Opus Castle: Chapter VI
summary: The final chapter of Opus Castle brings all stories to a close. In this haunting finale, all paths converge, and the castle forces you to confront everything you've discovered—and everything you've done. The spirits are restless, and the truth is no longer just a mystery to be solved, but a reckoning. The fate of the castle—and your own—depends on the decisions you make. Will you escape, or will you become another whisper in its haunted halls?

name: Open World Game: The Open World Game - The Gratuitous DLC
summary: Return to the realm that you have absolutely no reason to return to — Exuvia!

name: Open Road First Front S
summary: Be sure to read the Pioneer Handbook first! Hold the blade in your hand! Whether it is all the way through, or incarnated as a trial running man, as long as you reach the [recasting capsule]! Well, you'll be officially authorized as a Pioneer!

name: OpenMorrowind
summary:
OpenMW is a free, open source, and modern engine which re-implements and extends the 2002 Gamebryo engine for the open-world role-playing game The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind. Like the Construction Set for the original Morrowind engine, OpenMW comes with its own editor, called OpenMW-CS, which allows the user to edit or create their own mods or original games. Both OpenMW and OpenMW-CS are written from scratch, and aren’t made to support any third party programs that have been added to the original Morrowind engine to improve its functionality.

OpenMW is not a “mod” to Morrowind. It is an entirely different game engine that does not use the original Morrowind.exe in any way.

name: Opps! They Love Me Way Too Much!
summary: You'll immerse yourself in first-person perspective, encountering four boys with diverse personalities and appearances, embarking on various sweet love stories with them. The aloof boss, the gentle neighbor, the adorable coffeeboy, or the platonic friend? Among them, who will be your final choice?

name: Open The Gate: Just A Little
summary: Defense your medieval castle from unfriendly legions approaching in this Tower Defense Rogue-lite PvE. Combine your unique team of Human, Goblin, Undead... to defeat your enemies by slaying the Dragon in shortest amount of time!

name: Operation Carnage
summary: Operation Carnage is a top down arcade-style shoot-em-up for DOS developed by Midnight Synergy and released in 1996. It is now available as freeware.

name: Operation Breakout
Opus Castle: Chapter V
summary: In Chapter 5, the weight of the truth begins to sink in. The boundary between the living and the dead crumbles, and the castle becomes a labyrinth of emotions, memories, and dangers. You are no longer just a visitor—you are part of the story. At every step, you are forced to make choices that could bring salvation or doom. Can you handle the consequences of your curiosity?

name: Open Me!
summary: An addictive augmented reality puzzle game for the PS Vita system that challenges players to think “outside the box”. The goal is simple: open the box and collect the items inside. But be prepared – each box has its own unique traps that require you to think creatively.

name: Operation Empty Quiver
summary: Nuclear train assault in arcade shooter-platformer mechanics. Your main objective: infiltrate a military convoy, locate and destroy nuclear weapons.

name: OpenRCT2
summary: OpenRCT2 is an open-source re-implementation of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 (RCT2), expanding the game with new features, fixing bugs and raising game limits. The gameplay revolves around building and maintaining an amusement park containing attractions, shops and facilities. The player must try to make a profit and maintain a good park reputation whilst keeping the guests happy. OpenRCT2 allows for both scenario and sandbox play. Scenarios require the player to complete a certain objective in a set time limit whilst sandbox allows the player to build a more flexible park with optionally no restrictions or finance.

name: Operation: Pinkeye
summary: Operation: Pinkeye is a throwback first-person shooter set in an alternate Universe where the Acts of Union in 1707 never happened. Scotland and England remain independent and tensions between the 2 remain very high.

name: Open Your Eyes
summary: Fix your gaze on this grid-based puzzle game as you progress through levels by opening every eye. Discover eyes of different styles and properties and earn top ranks by focusing your vision and clearing stages with the least possible moves.

name: Open or Die
summary: In front of you are boxes. Some contain diamonds, while others contain death. How many times are you willing to take a risk to win in this deadly gambling show? Manipulate the odds and use items to emerge victorious. What will prove stronger, your greed or your instinct for self-preservation?

name: OPA: Super Janken
summary: A reimagining of the classic Rock-Paper-Scissors to make it more competitive and engaging. Collect the cards and boost your score by facing increasingly stronger opponents.

name: Operation Thunderbolt
summary:
Operation Thunderbolt is the exciting sequel to Operation Wolf. An airliner is hijacked by terrorists en-route from Paris to Boston, who threaten to kill all hostages on board if their mates aren't released from jail. Instead of reaching its destination, the airliner makes a landing in Kalubya, Africa, and all the hostages are hidden in various locations. The authorities have asked the hero from Operation Wolf to rescue the hostages, but only this time, the hero brings his friend along for the ride.

There are eight missions to complete in Operation Thunderbolt, and each one has you shooting down soldiers, choppers, and tanks. The gameplay varies every one or two missions. In some missions, you are driving a jeep or controlling a boat, while in others, you are walking while you're shooting. You have a limited supply of ammo, and a limited supply of rocket bombs, but you can always stock up by shooting down crates falling from the sky, or by killing a cat or dog that get in the line of fire. Also from crates, you can get special items like bulletproof vests, rocket bombs, and different weapons.

name: Operation Lovecraft: Fallen Doll
summary: A roguelike strategy game featuring squad tactics and deck building, paired with a real-time sexually explicit third person sandbox supporting up to 10 players on the same map. Command glamorous investigators as they battle (and bed) cultists & eldritch horrors from Cthulhu mythos.

name: Operation: Biowar
summary: Operation: Biowar, more generally known as Biowar, is a 19 level megawad created by Chris Harbin together with Paul Corfiatis and John Bishop. It was released in 1999, and features a combination of techbase and Hell levels but also some new themes including a snowy mountain. There are several new sound effects and textures but no changes in the regular Doom gameplay. The mod features music by well known composer Mark Klem.

name: Ophidia
summary:
Consume all life as a serpentine demi-god in Ophidia!

A decree has been made: all worlds must be purged so life may begin anew. Play as the legendary Norse Ouroboros, sent down from the heavens to cleanse Yggdrasil—the world tree—of all beings.

name: Opona
summary: The reality TV show Popworld is a one-way ticket to pop stardom, and Mia and Noah came here to win! Fight your way through turn-based dance battles (and a whole lot of drama) in this hand-drawn idol adventure game.

name: Operation Nachtsprung: Odyssey Live
summary:
In this online heist escape game, you and your team assume the roles of elite operatives assigned to breach the Bundesnachrichtendienst’s top-secret facility. Your objective is to locate and extract a single, highly classified artifact hidden deep within a fortified vault. Every step must be planned with precision, executed in silence and synchrony, and timed to perfection—any deviation from the agreed strategy risks alerting the guards and compromising the mission.

Genre and Setting:
Espionage thriller set in a modern, ultra-secure intelligence compound. Operation Nachtsprung is a First-person, point-and-click interface that emphasizes stealth and observation.

name: Operation: Polygon Storm
summary: A fastpaced, military tug-of-war game with minimal micromanagement. Choose and deploy from a mix of specialized military units to overwhelm the enemy. Experiment with a huge variety of unit compositions, synergies, abilities, and upgrades to lead your army to victory!

name: Operation: Ops
summary:
Operation:OPS is a lo-fi stealth-action FPS set in an alternate 199X.

Play as an operative seemingly working for the world's most notorious terrorist, who is known only as "The Operator".

Your health is low, and you are outnumbered and vulnerable. Once you are detected, enemy reinforcements will arrive in waves until your mission is complete.

A variety of equipment can be selected before you deploy, such as explosives, motion trackers, nerve-gas grenades, sentry guns and amphetamines.

Fight in up to nine different operations, with seven possible endings, depending on who you save, and whose orders you choose to follow.

name: Operation: Vicus
summary: Hey, so you're the chosen one? Welcome to your new home, your village! Build it up, develop it, take care of the needs of its inhabitants and fight the evil that haunts your village. But the most important thing is, can you solve the mystery of the village?

name: Opossession
summary:
Humanity has reached unparalleled heights of advancement, traversing the vast expanses of space and establishing settlements across the cosmos. With a staggering population of 400 quadrillion souls, our species has become ubiquitous throughout the universe. This era of evolution has heralded the emergence of novel technologies and occupations, among them the enigmatic profession of Mailmans.
These individuals navigate the expanse of the cosmos aboard spaceships reminiscent of delivery boxes, ferrying parcels and missives across the boundless reaches of space. Yet, amidst this sea of interstellar couriers, there exists a singular figure who stands apart.
A Mailman unlike any other, accompanied not by mere machinery, but by an unconventional companion—a pet opossum named BOB.

name: Open Wheel Manager
summary: Open Wheel Manager - is a classical tactical manager for the open wheel race fans.

name: Open Net Battle
summary: Open Net Battle is an open-source game/game engine based off of MegaMan Battle Network 6. Players can create and import Navis, BattleChips, Viruses, and more. Players can connect to real-world websites, battle each other, and more.

name: Operation Wolf
summary: A port of the arcade game that supports the Zapper and the Light Phaser, for the Nintendo Entertainment System and Sega Master System respectively. All the voice acting has been removed and the targets are much smaller due to sprite limitations.

name: Oppai Academy Big, Bouncy, Booby Babes!
summary: Get reincarnated into a fantasy world, take on the role of the protagonist Takumi, and use your magic to get all the girls! Clear various quests to progress the main story of this gorgeous fantasy visual novel, and capture the attractive heroines' hearts along the way!

name: Operation Smash
summary: Operation Smash

name: Operation: Thunder
summary: Operation Thunder is a top-down shooter with a tactical twist and destructible walls. Use your guns, gadgets and wits to outsmart your enemies and become a hero. Good luck, Soldier.

name: Oppai Muse
summary: Discover your perfect muse amidst music beats! This is a simple super casual rhythm game, full of colors and beauties! Collect stars and obtain hearts from women! Seek your path to the perfect date! Just remember - Girls will be listening. So don't step on her feet...

name: Operation Airsoft
summary: Operation Airsoft is an online first-person shooter based on the popular sport of airsoft. Choose from a library of real-life field layouts, including SpeedQB, Speedsoft, and Milsim gamestyles. Join Operation Airsoft and take advantage of the regular content updates that give a better feel for the game.

name: Operation Outsmart
summary: Physics-based sandbox game where you build wacky machines to solve environmental puzzles. Create alloys from a mix of metals to reinforce your builds, recruit koalas to operate your weapons, solve puzzles to get rewarded with parts and weapons, and save the island from the erupting volcano!

name: Operation Wolf
summary:
In the steamy jungles of South America, heavily armed extremists are holding innocent civilians prisoner. Little do these terrorists know that real terror is about to land on their front porch! The sound of rotor blades and staccato bursts of gunfire echo through the valleys. Terrorists be warned! Operation Wolf is going to teach you what terror is all about!

Operation Wolf consists of six missions, which are displayed on the Operations Map Screen. A mission is completed when all enemy forces are reduced to zero. The current level is completed when you escape from the airport with the prisoners. Your injury level increases when the enemy hits you. The game automatically ends if the injury indicator on the right side of the screen becomes completely red. You can reduce your injury level by getting power drinks.

name: Operation Dartness
summary: Operation Dartness is a dart-based roguelike set in a strange, shadowy USSR-inspired world. Trapped in this curious and unsettling environment, you must rack up absurd amounts of points to pursue a goal that lies far beyond your understanding.

name: Operation: Matriarchy
summary: Operation: Matriarchy is a science fiction first-person shooter. In the 24th century mankind has formed itself into the Federation of Earth, and has colonized several other planets. However, around 2350 a mysterious virus ravages the colony planet of Velia, targeting only the females within the population.

name: Operencia: The Stolen Sun
summary: Zen Studios’ modern homage to classic first-person dungeon-crawlers takes you to the land of Operencia, an unconventional fantasy world inspired by a faraway land referenced in countless Central European folktales. An old-school turn-based battle system combines with inspiration from unexplored mythology to offer an RPG experience that feels unique yet also familiar.

name: Operation Bodycam
summary:
"Operation Bodycam" offers an immersive first-person experience where players step into the role of a special unit officer, equipped with a body-worn camera that records all actions for later review. The game features realistic, tactical missions based on real-life police scenarios, such as hostage rescues and raids, requiring strategic planning and quick decision-making.

Players must navigate dynamic environments, adapt to various settings, and coordinate with AI teammates to succeed. Each choice has significant consequences, influencing the storyline and mission outcomes. A skill progression system allows for customization and improvement, while realistic graphics and sound add to the intensity of the experience.

name: OPG: Clan Wars
summary: Clan Wars is a severe first-person shooter with survival elements in the open world and in some limited locations, primarily oriented on online multiplayer game, and with the presence of a cars and trucks.

name: Oppressed
summary: Our protagonist Luke finds himself in a hallway with a gun on the floor, not knowing how he got there. He has no idea how and why he ended up here. The writing on the walls tells him to move through the corridors and find anomalies.

name: OpenArena
summary: OpenArena is a free, community-developed first-person shooter, similar to Quake III: Arena as it is based on the source code of the game along with the ioquake3 engine, and it is licensed under the GNU GPL version 2.

name: Optika
summary:
Discover the world of light physics: play with lasers, prisms, mirrors, magnets and dozens of other optical devices.
Explore the world of Optika with Prof. Opticus and his assistant, Sofia! Research and complete more than one hundred challenging puzzles!

name: Open Roads
summary: Long-lost family secrets. Hints of a hidden fortune. And miles to go before they sleep. Tess Devine’s relationship with her mom has never been easy, but they’re about to set out together on a journey into the past that they’ll never forget.

name: Open Brush
summary: Open source VR art tool built off of Google's open sourced Tilt Brush

name: Operation Thunderstorm
summary: A first person shooter by polish developers: City Interactive.

name: Operation HuntingHawk : Breakthrough
summary: Operation HuntingHawk : Breakthrough is a fast-paced single player first person shooter game that offers 9 highly playable levels. Players will face dangerous and challenging enemies and engage in intense battles with them.

name: Open Sesame: Alibaba Dash
summary: Run. Ride. Survive.

name: Open Sorcery: Jingle BEL/S
summary: Technology. Magic. PresentsOpen Sorcery: Jingle BEL/S celebrates the first Christmas of a newly sapient AI.

name: Operative Assailants
summary: I forgot the ess

name: Operation Sour Power
summary: Rebel with a jetpack. Charge, slash, and defy gravity in a platformer that punches back. Built in blood, blasted with speed. The jetpack hits different in OSP; A hand-drawn 2D platformer with punk energy and surgical flow.

name: Oppai Puzzle L
summary: It's been a busy day. Now, relax your body and come this way. Let the elder sister come to comfort your body after a long day.

name: Open At Nine
summary: “Massive debt, a shabby brothel, and a naughty succubus… This is all I get for defeating the Demon Lord?!” Hire monster girls to attract customers and pay off your debts! Don't forget to give your girls lots of hands-on job training!

name: Oppcium
summary: A sentient alien organism has escaped its cage and now freely roams a government facility. Silence has engulfed the city as a toxic and unidentified cloud was released from black oily stones. Witness and investigate a dire situation that appears to escalate by the hour.

name: Operation: Outbreak
summary: Your squad's vehicle exploded during a patrol, and you're the only survivor. The enemy is unusual this time. A virus has turned the city into a warzone of the undead. Get to the exfil in time or die trying. A free-to-play short and intense FPS zombie survival horror game.

name: Optica
summary:
Optica is a mind-bending puzzle game of logic and illusion.

Embracing simplicity with a geometric design, Optica reveals puzzles in complex and mind-bending ways. From curious shapes and optical illusions to unexpected perspectives, Optica puts spatial thinking to the test through 70+ challenging levels.

Create pathways of light while strategically connecting the spaces along the way. But not all is what it seems. Rotate shapes to shift your perspective, discover hidden planes, and traverse optical illusions.

As the spiritual successor to the award-winning Strata, Optica embodies a similar puzzle-solving philosophy with an entirely new twist.

name: Operation Flashpoint: Red River
summary:
Stand together with the US Marines in Operation Flashpoint: Red River, the ultimate tactical infantry shooter.

You’ll play as one of four distinct and complimentary classes in a Marine Fireteam – Grenadier, Scout, Rifleman and Automatic Rifleman - as you embark on an epic campaign. Take on huge sandbox battlefields in the new setting of Tajikistan, a geopolitical hotspot bordered by Afghanistan and China. Face the unpredictable threat of all-new insurgent enemies and the might of the world’s largest Army, the Chinese PLA. Use authentic tactics on your own initiative in solo or in four player drop-in, drop-out co-op campaign.

For extended replayability, Operation Flashpoint: Red River also includes new class choice, load-out personalisation plus standalone co-op Fireteam Engagements. With a huge range of authentic weapons and the chance to call in devastating airstrikes, Operation Flashpoint: Red River will put you in the boots of a Marine like never before.

name: Operation Body Count
summary:
In the year 2012, Foreign Terrorists led by the infamous Victor Baloch have taken control of the Twin "U.N towers" in the United States of America, capturing the leaders of the world who were holding a summit at the time.

As a member of the Governments "Elite Force", trained to take out terrorists when the talking stops, you must enter one of the towers through its maintenance area, which can be accessed through the sewers.

OBC has 40 levels with the first 5 taking place in the sewers where the player, strangely, fights off giant rats and mutants the manual calls Sludge Minions before they enter the first tower to take on the terrorists.

The weapons available to the player include a shotgun with infinite ammo, an Uzi, Galil, Flame Thrower and Grenade Launcher (though it functions like a Rocket Launcher).

The aim of each level in OBC is to kill a certain number of terrorists on a map before using one of several elevators or stairs to go up to the next floor.

OBC pioneered many features including controllable allies (the other members of your squad that join you once you enter the tower). You can order them to follow you or to roam the floor killing all they find. The player can also freely jump between their bodies in the games take on a lives system; as long as the team member they are in isn't killed there is no limit on this.

OBC also features a near fully destructible environment; the Flame Thrower can set bad guys, scenery and the level itself on fire, which could make movement extremely hazardous for the player, especially as the fire randomly spreads. The Grenade launcher meanwhile can destroy any wall (with some hard coded exceptions).

Like Blake Stone OBC also features textured floors and ceilings. Though unlike Blake, OBC could have several different floor textures on the same map. However OBC's floor/ceiling graphics were partially parallax meaning they appeared to "warp" as the player moves around.

name: Opaloid Kingdom
summary: Explore dungeons filled with monsters, traps and gold coins! Opaloid Kingdom is a retro-style dungeon crawler set in a medieval world. Enjoy quick and satisfying gameplay in a magical land full of wizards, treasure and dragons!

name: Open World Game: The Open World Game
summary: Open World Game: the Open World Game is the purest open world game experience. We broke open world games down to their core so you don't have to deal with any more gorgeous 3D environments distracting you, stellar voice acting performances drawing you in, or even a prolonged epic Main Quest constantly weighing you down for ignoring it in lieu of collecting every card in that mini game. Just pure unadulterated open world game... game.

name: Operation Crusader
summary: A computer wargame released on DOS and Mac in 1994. It takes place during World War II and the players can choose between being an Ally or being a member of the Axis. It is the first game of the World at War series.

name: Open Up Shut Up
summary: Players answer questions and judge each others answers.

name: Opus Mortem
summary: Play as the Death. Test your reflexes while trying to redirect souls to their respective destinations. Don't worry if it's a bit hard at the beginning, every work gets easier with time and experience!

name: Open in the Groove
summary: An open-source rhythm dancing game which is a fork of StepMania 3.95 with the goal of adding arcade-like ITG-style behavior and serving as a drop-in replacement for the ITG binary on arcade cabinets.

name: Operation CrossCounter
summary: Operation CrossCounter is set in a fully-3D science fiction universe that is under invasion by evil machines known as the Guroken. Players partner with up to two other players or computer-controlled characters to complete missions and beat back the robotic invaders. Each mission is unique and may feature different goals, maps and enemies based on the game’s “War Situation System,” which analyzes each individual mission and bases future metagame events on the results for a unique experience every session. In Operation CrossCounter, every player is fighting for the future!

name: OpenPop
summary: OpenWord population real time strategy.

name: Opioid visions 88
summary: Opioid visions 88 is a first person shooter. The game presents the protagonist's visions of substances that expand consciousness.

name: Opka.io
summary: A multiplayer browser game where players must survive as long as possible in a chaotic arena.

name: OpenCity
summary: OpenCity is a free and open-source software 3D city-building game started in 2003 by France-based Vietnamese programmer Duong-Khang Nguyen. The game mechanics are similar to Simcity, while the game developers don't strive to make it a direct Simcity clone.

name: Operation Osam Bin Laden
summary: Upon discovering the location of the Al-Qaeda leader in exile, the US army sends their best commandos to northern Pakistan. Take control of these commandos, send them behind enemy territories on a hazardous mission, and bring them back alive.

name: Option Monster
summary: Short game bundled in a Disc Station compile.

name: Operation Shadow
summary: Operation Shadow is an ACtion Adventure game for the N-Gage

name: Ophidian Wars: Opac's Journey
summary: Xbox Indie Game. Cost = 80 Microsoft Points.  Acrobatic platformer.

name: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission - Rescue Edition
Operator
summary: Operator is a minimalist elevator management game. Your job is to get passengers to their destination before they stress out. Can you keep up with the demand?

name: OpenClonk
summary: OpenClonk is a free multiplayer action game in which players control clonks, small but witty and nimble humanoid beings. The game is mainly about mining, settling, and fast-paced melees.

name: Operation Sexy Sudoku
summary: Solve puzzles to release two dimensional girls from their misty curse. Gather your team of mental gymnasts to aid you on your quest. Unlimited variations of sudoku puzzles.

name: Operation Breadcrumbs
summary: A management and narrative game set in a world of birds! Play as Robin and return home to revitalize your late Pa's bed and breakfast, forging meaningful connections as you rebuild the community in the face of an encroaching corporation.

name: Operation 7
summary: A fast paced modern military themed online FPS.

name: Opera Super Sports
summary:
Opera Super Sports is a compilation of five sport games from Opera Soft :

.- Angel Nieto Pole 500
.- Golden Basket
.- Jai Alai
.- Mundial de Fútbol
.- Poli Díaz

name: Operation: Desert City
summary: Short FPS where you are Spec Ops soldier with a suicide mission in Desert City

name: Opus 1 - Social Justice War
summary: Shoot down fascists and free humanity from bigotry!

name: Operation Blood
summary: It is an on-rails first-person shooter released in 1992 for Atari. The player is provided with one main weapon (a rifle) and one secondary weapon (grenades) and his main goal is to kill all enemies on the screen while trying to not shoot civilians or medics. The player cannot control the camera, the screen scrolls from the right side to the left side or vice versa by itself. There are also power-ups appearing from time to time which the player can use in order to achieve victory.

name: Open the Door: A Short Story About Life
summary:
It is a story of a small journey that doesn't take that long. Please pick it up and try to open the "door".
In "A Short Game of Opening Doors," you walk through a fantastic world and collect "Money" and "Delight" to open doors and move forward. The game is a 3D adventure game in which you walk through a slightly fantastical world, collect "Money" and "Delight", and try to open the door and move on. Don't worry, there are no difficult actions, ferocious monsters, or overly complicated puzzles. If you walk, the story will move forward as much as you walk.

name: Operation: Overkill II
summary: Operation: Overkill II or simply "OOII" was a popular BBS Door Game known for grisly combat, set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

name: Opus Castle: Chapter II
summary: Continue the journey in this adventure and mysterious game with a narrative based on the real tragic history of the little castle on Apa Street, located in the city of São Paulo, Brazil.

name: Open That Vein
summary: Open That Vein is a Parser-based horror text adventure and a La Petite Mort entry in ECTOCOMP 2015.

name: Opus
summary: after the world ends, you've got to keep yourself busy.

name: Opening Night at the Großen Schauspielhaus: Berlin 1927
summary: Visit Berlin 1927 and explore the VR-reconstruction of the famous theatre. Three storytellers, Walter, Fritzi and Otto, invite you to share their anticipation of the opening night – behind the scenes and on stage. Our digital theatre opens new perspectives; cultural heritage comes alive virtually.

name: Operation Desolate Void
summary: Operation Desolate Void is a multiplayer FPS based around choosing the right weapons & equipment to head into a mission with to make it out alive.

name: OpenTyrian
summary:
Tyrian is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shooter. The story is set in 20,031 where you play as Trent Hawkins, a skilled fighter-pilot employed to fight Microsol and save the galaxy.

OpenTyrian is a port of the DOS shoot-em-up Tyrian. Jason Emery generously gave the OpenTyrian developers a copy of the Tyrian 2.1 source code, which has since been ported from Turbo Pascal to C. The port uses SDL, making it easily cross-platform.

name: Operation Spruance: The Naval Warfare Simulation
Optical Illusions
summary: Screamer browser game from the creator of The Maze.

name: Open Ocean
summary: Discover what it's like to live the life of a shark in today's open ocean. A small game with a powerful message.

name: Operation Cobra
summary: You find yourself stranded in an unfamiliar place, surrounded by mud. You have no chance of escaping this zombie-filled island. Your only chance of survival is to fight off the zombies.

name: Opposites

When one player's open space reaches the other player's edge, they win the game. Opposites can be played either against the computer or with a second player.
